txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Broken longswords from goblins or tomb-robbers threatening the areas surrounding the haven of Ost Forod. Deliver the items to Parr Chopley at the centre of the fortress.
'It looks as though you showed this bunch a thing or two.'

'There are a great many threats in this place, some from within, but those outside the walls are greater than most others. We'd like to see that the goblins and more aggressive tomb-robbers are kept in their place. Their broken weapons or sword sheaths will suffice.'
Wardens of Ann√∫minas Task: Broken Longswords
Parr Chopley, an out-of-place hobbit at Ost Forod, awaits the delivery of broken longswords at the haven outpost of Ost Forod in Evendim.
Deliver the broken longswords to the hobbit Parr Chopley at the outpost of Ost Forod

You have accepted a task to collect the broken longswords from the goblins or tomb-robbers surrounding the haven outpost of Ost Forod in Evendim. You are to deliver the items to Parr Chopley, a hobbit, living in the settlement.
Wanted: Broken longswords from goblins or tomb-robbers threatening the areas surrounding the haven of Ost Forod.
